conbody.p: Katalon Recorder allows you to edit any recorded commands or added the new command at any point in the steps. Command, Target, Value display information of currently selected command. This entry field is modifiable.

To edit, select the step to be changed and edit it using the Command, Target, and Value fields. Command text field displays a drop-down menu to suggest commands based on the entering characters. Katalon Recorder supports most of the common Selenium commands.

ul.li: Actions – Commands that reproduce user interaction on the application under test.
Accessors – Commands are used to store the results in variables.
Assertions – Commands that verify the application under test behave as expected.

conbody.p: For more details about Selenium commands, refer to Selenium documentation: The Selenium Browser Automation Project.
For more detail list of support commands, refer to Selenese (Selenium IDE) Commands Reference.
